content: Mosque in Orchard, SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Masjid Al-Falah, Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(April 2021)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Al-Falah Mosque** ([Malay](/wiki/Malay_language): *Masjid Al-Falah*), built in 1987, is a [mosque](/wiki/Mosque) in Singapore. ## Transportation The mosque is accessible from [Somerset MRT station](/wiki/Somerset_MRT_station). - [Islam in Singapore](/wiki/Islam_in_Singapore) - [List of mosques in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_mosques_in_Singapore) - Universities - [Al-Falah University, India](/wiki/Al-Falah_University), private university under investigation for Islamist terror attacks in India - [Al Falah University, Dubai](/wiki/Al_Falah_University,_Dubai), UAE - [Alfalah University, Jalalabad](/wiki/Alfalah_University,_Jalalabad), Afghanistan - Al-Falah Mosque - Majlis Ugama Islam Singapura, MUIS (Islamic Religious Council of Singapore) - List of Mosques in Singapore managed by MUIS : Masjid Al-Falah 1°18′13″N 103°50′03″E﻿ / ﻿1.3036°N 103.8343°E﻿ / 1.3036; 103.8343 This article about a [mosque](/wiki/Mosque) or other [Islamic](/wiki/Islamic) place of worship in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Masjid Al-Falah, Singapore
